abstract: United States confirms that it has set up small Marine base in northern Iraq; disclosure follows Islamic State rocket attack that left one Marine dead and several others injured.
lead_paragraph: The disclosure followed a rocket attack by the Islamic State that killed one Marine and wounded several others.

headline.main: Marine Base in Northern Iraq Is Confirmed by Pentagon
headline.print_headline: Marine Base in North Iraq Is Confirmed by Pentagon

snippet: The disclosure followed a rocket attack by the Islamic State that killed one Marine and wounded several others.
